name: Midnight Ninja
description:
Slice first, sheathe your sword and watch the results of your actions. In this fast ninja game, any and all damage you inflict will only be applied every 10 seconds, as you sheathe your katana, as a very cliché and over the top finisher.

The game features fast movement, double jumps, wall jumping and dashing.

Aim for a high score by killing as many enemies as possible at the same time !

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Dash / Sprint (Hold)

Space - Jump

Mouse1 - Attack

Mouse2 - Use shuriken

E - Advance level when available

Edit: Fixed a bug that would stop you from progressing to the next level if you died, and stopped you from reaching level 3
